remarks: Univariate polynomial evaluation maps (multiplicative) group sums to group sums.  (Contributed by AV, 14-Sep-2019.)
statement:
evls1gsummul.q $e |- Q = ( S evalSub1 R ) $.
evls1gsummul.k $e |- K = ( Base ` S ) $.
evls1gsummul.w $e |- W = ( Poly1 ` U ) $.
evls1gsummul.g $e |- G = ( mulGrp ` W ) $.
evls1gsummul.1 $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` W ) $.
evls1gsummul.u $e |- U = ( S |`s R ) $.
evls1gsummul.p $e |- P = ( S ^s K ) $.
evls1gsummul.h $e |- H = ( mulGrp ` P ) $.
evls1gsummul.b $e |- B = ( Base ` W ) $.
evls1gsummul.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. CRing ) $.
evls1gsummul.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) $.
evls1gsummul.y $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. N ) -> Y e. B ) $.
evls1gsummul.n $e |- ( ph -> N C_ NN0 ) $.
evls1gsummul.f $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. N |-> Y ) finSupp .1. ) $.
evls1gsummul $p |- ( ph -> ( Q ` ( G gsum ( x e. N |-> Y ) ) ) = ( H gsum ( x e. N |-> ( Q ` Y ) ) ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d N x $.
$d Q x $.
$d ph x $.
